post.body: Kind of like it as is now (looks like a unix terminal prompt)... but agree with @stevetrs if you HAVE to switch
Loved GBG. LOVED
Might have more to do with the overall quality of my 4 years old HDTV vs this new one...
Haha! YES!
That would be perfect!!
Brillisnt and wonderful! I love it!!
whoa... 60% off! I'm jealous
dude... it really is
haha! yes!
I did, but I told them to leave. I wanted the joy of setup myself :)
haha, like what you're watching!
lol
I really like it
going to a birthday party tonight - thanks, tho
Yes! Wish we could change both those points :)
wow, we have VERY similar musical tastes (just put Prince up there near the top somewhere)
It is truly our pleasure. Thanks for watching :)
Haha! Love it! Sorry not to help you out with that, but I'm glad we made it in, even if only in sillouette :)
Dude, that be crazy! I thought N4S was a multi-million seller!
I love it! Stage actor=great choice
Amazing! Can't wait!
amazing! Congrats!!
you nailed me on Lawn Dogs :)
LOL!
own it. love it.
Home seems to be working now!
wow... you went from bad to worse! ... I kid, I kid ;)
Looks like Monday is my night to party. Hopefully there'll be something fun to do :)
love it! Only minor gripe is a lame remote
just read your defense of the written word on Shawn Elliot's blog, and, dude, seriously, you're my fucking hero. Great stuff.
madonna inn!
they had to move up their recording to last night, so I wasn't on, unfortunately
yep!
AMAZING!!!
awesome, thanks!
yup... hoping to be there! Was bummed I missed the epic Yours session
Send me the deets!
gracias :)
@GarnettLee Super jealous. Wish I could have been there. Looking forward to listening.
lol, thanks :)
that was pretty awesome
kick ass!
Loving it! Although the remote/menu system are a bit annoying
I never got a chance to see it, actually
Woot!!
Awesome suggestion! LOVE Purple Rain!
Good luck at the first round! Pong 'em dead!
I certainly do
you and vinny are amazing! The perfect couple! Happy new year!
thanks so much. Happy new Year!
Well... after all those delays PS Home still launches with a thud here in the US? Getting only errors. Supposedly working in the UK...?
No Walton Goggins Golden Globe nom=crime.
Shocked at some of the Golden Globe nomination ommissions... but VERY happy to see so many Vicki Christina Barcelona noms
My fav Shield character gets his own movie... almost. :) Thanks to @rulesaremyenemy http://is.gd/baJh
An article for @dannytrs: http://is.gd/bbDY
Fallout DLC... proof it will continue to pwn my life: http://is.gd/b8m9
Word. http://snipurl.com/7r9p2
4-player co-op in CoD: WaW with the guys was intense! Had to stop to head out to a friend's "fancy dress" birthday party.
Wow, one long day/night of TRS shooting. I think what we came up with for an intro is funny... but we shall see if my opinion is shared :)
Because you demanded it... We just shot a new Dan Becomes a Man for next week :)
Rad! Judah Friedlander representing the Mick Foley gear on tonight's 30 Rock... BANG BANG!!
Thanks for the updates, people. Home working for me now.
Okay Sony Home, I give up on you. Been trying for over an hour. Someone please tweet when it is even moderately stable.
Massive power outage in my hometown. Sitting in the dark. Solution to boredom? DS/PSP. :)
At a graduation party for a family friend. He's actually working on a cool facebook app that is a diablo clone. Diablo in facebook! Cool!
Golf with Dad a huge success. And it turned into a really nice day, too. I felt real improvement in my swing :)
Playing 18 holes with my dad. It is early, cold, and wet. What better time to play golf? ... :(
Passing through Santa barbara, flood of memories rushing at me
Oh crap... grapevine closed due to snow. Looks like I'll have to drive the 101 up to the Bay Area. Ugh, 2+ hours just got added to my drive
Thanks to everyone for the nice words about Y&R. :)
Maybe I've turned the corner on my picks! Taking Eagles in the late game for the win!
My perfect score on the bet-against-me-and-you're-sure-to-win picks from yesterday is on the line as I go with Baltimore for the early game.
My sure-to-be-wrong pick for the late game: Colts.
Everyone saying Atlanta was the favorite, but I thought the line was Arz by 3
I am going to go ahead and pick Atlanta to upset the Cards.
Time to shoot a new TRS!
Had the misfortune of seeing Gran Torino last night. The same man that made Mystic River and Million Dollar Baby made this? Impossible.
I am so drunk!
With @kevinrose's prediction of a twitter crash, I'll go ahead and wish everyone a Happy New Year now. Best wishes for 2009 everyone!!
